properties.title: GRID3 COD - Settlement Extents v3.1
properties.description:
The current version supersedes GRID3 COD - Settlement Extents v3.0; the following changes were made:
- Corrections on imputed values for building count and building areas.
- Corrections on probability values from field-collected data
- Edits in the Data Release Notes
The two layers contained within the GRID3 COD - Settlement Extents v3.1 include:
-
GRID3_COD_settlement_extents_v3_1.gpkg: a spatial layer representing settlement polygons.
-
GRID3_COD_settlement_grid_v3_1.gpkg: a spatial layer representing the centroids of settled grid cells.
For more information on data inputs, methodology, and codebooks please see the Data Release Notes.

properties.purpose: The GRID3 COD - Settlement Extents v3.1 consists of a geographic representation of settlements in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, in two forms: 1) settlement polygons, and 2) spatial points depicting the centroids of settled grid cells at 3-arc seconds (or ~100 meters) contained within settlement polygons. Data inputs and methodology are described in the data release notes.
